mesquite.lib

Class ProgressIndicator

  • java.lang.Object
    • mesquite.lib.ProgressIndicator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Abortable

    public class ProgressIndicator
extends java.lang.Object
implements Abortable
    presents a progress window

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ProgressIndicator(MesquiteProject mp, java.lang.String title)
      If this constructor is used, then the progress indicator doesn't have a final value, and thus is just a "spinning" indicator
      ProgressIndicator(MesquiteProject mp, java.lang.String title, long total)
